name: aluminum
description: Aluminum is a lightweight, silvery-white metal known for its corrosion resistance and flexibility. Its low density and high strength-to-weight ratio make it ideal for structural and high-tech uses.

allomancy.description: Shields {PAWN} from investiture. Also wipes away all other investiture reserves.

feruchemy.description: Stores identity, allowing anonymous interactions or forgery.

store.description: This pawn is storing nutrition in a aluminum metalmind. Their metabolism speeds up dramatically, burning through food reserves at an accelerated rate. They become hungry faster and must eat more to maintain energy â€” but the nutrition is preserved for future emergencies.

tap.description: This pawn is tapping an aluminum metalmind, solidifying their Identity. Their investiture is tightly bound to them, resisting foreign influence and making keyed metalminds nearly impossible to access by others.
